channel.title: Need help with Commands (lol im new at this coding, but i still get it)
channel.description:
:( ok ok..i want the basic codes, like ::food for 10m manta ray or something. Or ::pk for a place to pk, where do i set these codes? I really can't seem to find where, and the tutorials won't load the site for my computer. Please help
I want: ::pk ::food ::sweet (a pk set) and a ::commands so ppl can see my commands Please help =P +++I NEED MY RANGING SPOT TO GET RANGED UP FASTER!

item.title: Need help with Commands (lol im new at this coding, but i still get it)
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

Yeh, find:

if(command.startsWith("bank")){

or

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")){

when you have found that find the last } <<<<---- (bracket)
and then enter in your code, you will need to add “else if” to all of the IFs though.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Commands (lol im new at this coding, but i still get it)
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("food")) { addItem(####, 10000000); sendMessage("Fill in the # with the ID NO"); }

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Pk")){ teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("Fill in the # with coord IDS"); }

Enjoy.
